scripts.build: yarn openapi:bundle && yarn generate:definitions && yarn generate:backend-notification-hub && tsc
scripts.openapi:bundle: yarn node copy-commons-definitions.js && yarn openapi:bundle:internal && yarn openapi:bundle:external
scripts.generate:backend-notification-hub: rimraf ./generated/notifications && shx mkdir -p generated/notifications && gen-api-models --strict 0 --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-backend/v8.10.1/notification_queue_messages.yaml --out-dir generated/notifications
scripts.bump:openapi:internal: bundle-api-spec -i openapi/index.yaml -o openapi/index.yaml -V $npm_package_version && git add openapi/index.yaml
scripts.bump:openapi:external: bundle-api-spec -i openapi/index_external.yaml -o openapi/index_external.yaml -V $npm_package_version && git add openapi/index_external.yaml
